```{r echo=F}
copy(INFOS) %>%
    extract(
      j = TIME := time.numeric.to.posixct(TIME)
    ) %>%
    htmlTable(css.table = "width: 100%; margin-top: 1em; margin-bottom: 1em;",
              rnames = F)
with(PERIOD, {
  data.table(
    START = int_start(NATURE.INTERVAL),
    NATURAL.PERIOD = as.character(NATURE.PERIOD),
    TRADE.DAYS = TRADE.DAYS,
    END = int_end(NATURE.INTERVAL))
}) %>%
  htmlTable(css.table = "width: 100%; margin-top: 1em; margin-bottom: 1em;",
              rnames = F)
```

```{r echo=F}
ggvis(TIMESERIE.ACCOUNT[, TIME := time.numeric.to.posixct(TIME)], ~TIME, ~EQUITY) %>% layer_lines %>%
  add_axis('x', title = 'EQUITY') %>% add_axis('y', title = '')

```
